data.text: Based in Arlington, Texas, we began our respiratory continuing education division in October of 1996 and have produced over 500 live seminars and symposiums (in both hotel and hospital conference rooms). We now provide exclusively online content through our website. Our traditional courses include Recorded Live Credit and Real-Time Live Broadcasts (Interactive Webinars) which are presented via Zoom. We also offer Self-Directed (non-traditional) courses which are available to take 24/7. All of our courses are approved by the American Association for Respiratory Care and are accepted throughout the United States. We are proud to have developed a reputation for combining premium education with reliability and customer service.
